Questionnaire.Title: REGARDING THE COMPLETION OF THE LORILLARD TOBACCO COMPANY LOBBYIST EMPLOYER REPORT FOR THE FIRST QUARTER, 1990
Questionnaire.Instructions: Please read this questionnaire thoroughly and complete all sections fully. The lobbying laws in California place the burden of scrutiny through the audit process on lobby employers rather than the lobbyists themselves.

Eilers_Specific_Lobbying_Interests.Activities: We will indicate the lobbying activities which have been undertaken on your behalf. If there are additional lobbying activities which have been engaged in during the quarter, please add them here and identify them both by Bill number if you lobbied the Legislature, or description and the state agency involved.

Payments.Lobbyists: It is our understanding that you do not have a registered California lobbyist who is an employee of your company. If you have an officer or employee who is employed as a registered lobbyist, then please contact us immediately.
